EmailTemplate.name: 2019.01.25 - ISO Furniture Blitz Reminder.2019.01.25 - ISO Furniture Blitz Remin
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to save on updating your office furniture.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Furniture/_/N-acq?cmp=EBBSFURNEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> FRESH YEAR, FRESH START! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Furniture/_/N-acq?cmp=EBBSFURNEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Still thinking about updating your office furniture?
We totally know you are and this is your last chance to save BIG! Spend $100 and get 15% OFF your furniture purchase.
Use Code: 1901FURN Update Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Furniture/_/N-acq?cmp=EBBSFURNEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Check out our Deal Centre <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Office-Furniture/_/N-1z0czraZacq?cmp=EBDCNAVFURNEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
for this month’s furniture deals! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Office-Furniture/_/N-1z0czraZacq?cmp=EBDCNAVFURNEN]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account to use promo code. Offer valid at grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1901FURN at checkout. Must spend $100 or more on products featured within the online furniture category before tax to receive 15% off your furniture purchase. Not valid on special furniture orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires January 25, 2019.
